content: Lang-Baw-Baw is one of the optional Yaoguai Chiefs you can fight in Chapter 6 of Black Myth: Wukong"). This frog boss is the final of the six you can find across the chapters.
promot:
This excerpt is taken from the file "Lang-Baw-Baw.md", under the primary heading "Lang-Baw-Baw". The content is presented below:

Lang-Baw-Baw is one of the optional Yaoguai Chiefs you can fight in Chapter 6 of Black Myth: Wukong"). This frog boss is the final of the six you can find across the chapters.
